statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date, completion_date FROM employee_training_programs WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT program_name, employee_name FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, employee_id, completed FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_description IS NOT NULL AND completed = FALSE;
SELECT program_name, program_description, start_date, completion_date FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, completion_date, completed FROM employee_training_programs WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, employee_id, program_name FROM employee_training_programs WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND completed = FALSE;
SELECT program_name, start_date, completion_date FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Communication%'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hired_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hired_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('Marketing', 'HR') ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT course_name, description FROM courses;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT department, employee_id, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM employees e JOIN enrollments en ON e.employee_id = en.employee_id JOIN courses c ON en.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.department = 'Sales';

SELECT employee_name, course_name FROM employees e JOIN enrollments en ON e.employee_id = en.employee_id JOIN courses c ON en.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.trainer_id = 1 ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, description FROM employees e JOIN enrollments en ON e.employee_id = en.employee_id JOIN courses c ON en.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.description LIKE '%Database%' ORDER BY e.employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_instructor FROM courses WHERE course_instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT enrollment_date, enrollment_status FROM enrollments WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM employees JOIN enrollments ON employees.employee_id = enrollments.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, progress_percentage FROM employees JOIN enrollments ON employees.employee_id = enrollments.employee_id JOIN progress ON enrollments.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE manager_id = 101;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, course_name FROM employees JOIN enrollments ON employees.employee_id = enrollments.employee_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;

SELECT employee_name, assessment_score FROM employees JOIN enrollments ON employees.employee_id = enrollments.employee_id JOIN assessments ON enrollments.enrollment_id = assessments.enrollment_id WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
